title: Rengar needs to have more leap range...
body:
Hey Riot, I am a Rengar main that thinks he needs to get buffed.

Before you say that he is strong enough, i need to interrupt you and say that he doesnt need a real buff, just increase his leap range.

Why, you may ask?
Bcs he needs it very hard.
He cant gank midlane very good without his ultimate. His leap range isn't enough to jump from midlane bush to midlane champs, nor minions.
When he is taking Blue Buff, i would like him to jump from Blue buffs bush to gromp, to generate stacks and move and clear faster.


You may also been askin', will he be OP then?
Well I can certainly say NO.
Bcs of champs like Hecarim, Rammus, Sejuani, Evelynn, That make ganks so easier.

It's very hard to gank as Rengar without his R, and he is just very bad at it.
 He has no dashes, and the only way to gank better is to bait someone to the bush and then you jump on it.


Pls Rito, consider it, just test it and you will see, it's a small change but with BIG IMPACT!!!!

replies.body: Happy April Fool's Day to you, too.
{{champion:107}} needs a buff in the same way I need carbon dioxide.

He DOESNT NEED A BUFF THAT WILL INCREASE HIS DAMAGE!!!
I am saying that, in case Rito wants rengar to be a normal champ he should increase his leap range.
If you could jump half a lane that’s just broken. Many jungles rely on their R anyways, just use it. Not to mention with extending range top Rengar would be EVEN MORE oppressive.

But I already said it, they are also of junglers that dont, and look at Hecarim for example.
When he uses his E he can oneshot you and i am not talking about mixing it with predator.
Rengar wouldnt be broken even if they buff him like this bcs he is a medium hard champ.
It would be easier, bcs everyone knows that he can't do anything without his R.
He’s medium hard BECAUSE he has these limitations. Removing them makes him blatantly strong.
